name: Maze Mania (MakersEmpire)
description:
Maze Mania by Makers Empire RACE YOU TO THE FLAG!

Can you be the fastest one through the maze? Run and jump through an infinite variety of mazes created by makers around the world! 

Maze Mania lets you create and share mazes. It might just be the easiest way to make a game!

CRAFT A MASTERPIECE

Your maze, your rules. Choose the powerups, enemies and environment. Easy or hard? Jump, run or fall? What will keep your players coming back for just one more try?

DO IT YOUR WAY

Be as creative as you like with your avatar's style. Go beyond the basic choices of hats and hairstyles and create your own with simple tools. There really is no limit.

JOIN OUR DISCORD

Help us craft the most fun game creation platform ever! Join us at https://discord.gg/yVvJjwgR

HOW TO PLAY

Use a combination of mouse and keyboard. Xbox controllers are supported during racing.

In play mode (racing):

  • WASD or arrow keys to move around
  • Right-click and drag to rotate the camera
  • Space bar to jump (after picking up a spring powerup)
  • Xbox controller - left stick to move, right stick to rotate camera, A or Y to jump

When editing mazes:

  • Left-click to add / remove / paint blocks
  • Left-click and drag to add / remove / paint faster
  • Scroll wheel or hold ALT and drag to zoom the camera
  • Middle-click and or hold CTRL and drag to pan the camera 
  • Double-click off the grid to reset the camera

We support a few alternative ways to rotate the camera to make it accessible for everyone, so these also work to change your view:

  • Hold shift and drag
  • Left-click and drag when in play mode 
  • Left-click off the grid and drag when in editing mode
  • Left-click and drag on the view cube in the top right
